title: ðŸ†• VritraAI v0.29.5 Update Released!
message: A new update for VritraAI (v0.29.5) is now live! This version includes major improvements: interactive command handling fixes, enhanced error recovery system, sanitized traceback for AI suggestions, version-change notification system with one-time changelog banner, and multiple stability tweaks. Update now for a smoother and smarter AI terminal experience!
